评论概述: Cute bag, wish the strap was longer (update)
评论详情: The bag feels fluffy and is very cute, i have a pretty long arms so the bag strap is pretty short for me. the inside is made out of a plastic type of material and i haven’t had any issues with shedding yet. it zips closed and the zipper feels pretty sturdy. pretty spacious as well.  (update) I’ve had the bag for about a week now and i’ve used it twice now, the outside zipper is more sturdy than the inside pocket zipper. The only things i carry in my bag are my phone, a pack of gum and a couple cards. After a week the zipper on the inside fell off due to the stitching ripping.  Other than that the bag is still cute and if you use it for fashion/aesthetic purposes it’s really nice.
